00026 #include "lpc17xx_i2s.h"

00032 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00038 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00040 #define BUFFER_SIZE                     0x0A
00041 
00042 #define DMA_SIZE                0x100UL
00043 
00047 #define DMA_SRC                 LPC_AHBRAM1_BASE
00048 
00052 #define DMA_DST                 (DMA_SRC+DMA_SIZE)
00053 
00054 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES ***********************/
00055 uint8_t menu[]=
00056         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00057         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00058         " I2S test DMA mode demo \n\r"
00059         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00060         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00061         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00062         " Use two I2S channels in the same board to transfer data use DMA mode\n\r"
00063         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00064 
00065 // Terminal Counter flag for Channel 0
00066 __IO uint32_t Channel0_TC;
00067 
00068 // Error Counter flag for Channel 0
00069 __IO uint32_t Channel0_Err;
00070 
00071 // Terminal Counter flag for Channel 1
00072 __IO uint32_t Channel1_TC;
00073 
00074 // Error Counter flag for Channel 1
00075 __IO uint32_t Channel1_Err;
00076 
00077 volatile uint32_t *I2STXBuffer = (uint32_t*)(DMA_SRC);
00078 volatile uint32_t *I2SRXBuffer = (uint32_t*)(DMA_DST);
00079

00081 void DMA_IRQHandler (void);
00082 
00083 void Buffer_Init(void);
00084 Bool Buffer_Verify(void);

00087 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00088 /*********************************************************************/
00093 void DMA_IRQHandler (void)
00094 {
00095         // check GPDMA interrupt on channel 0
00096         if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INT, 0)){ //check interrupt status on channel 0
00097                 // Check counter terminal status
00098                 if(GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTTC, 0)){
00099                         // Clear terminate counter Interrupt pending
00100                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTTC, 0);
00101                                 Channel0_TC++;
00102                 }
00103                 // Check error terminal status
00104                 if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTERR, 0)){
00105                         // Clear error counter Interrupt pending
00106                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTERR, 0);
00107                         Channel0_Err++;
00108                 }
00109         }
00110         if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INT, 1)){ //check interrupt status on channel 0
00111                 // Check counter terminal status
00112                 if(GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTTC, 1)){
00113                         // Clear terminate counter Interrupt pending
00114                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTTC, 1);
00115                                 Channel1_TC++;
00116                 }
00117                 // Check error terminal status
00118                 if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTERR,1)){
00119                         // Clear error counter Interrupt pending
00120                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTERR, 1);
00121                         Channel1_Err++;
00122                 }
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00127 /*********************************************************************/
00132 void Buffer_Init(void) {
00133         uint8_t i;
00134 
00135         for (i = 0; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++) {
00136                 I2STXBuffer[i] = ((i+1)<<16) + i + 1;
00137                 I2SRXBuffer[i] = 0;
00138         }
00139 }
00140 
00141 /*********************************************************************/
00146 Bool Buffer_Verify(void) {
00147         uint8_t i;
00148         uint32_t *pTX = (uint32_t *) &I2STXBuffer[0];
00149         uint32_t *pRX = (uint32_t *) &I2SRXBuffer[1];
00150 
00151         for (i = 0; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++) {
00152                 if (*pTX++ != *pRX++)  {
00153                         /* Call Error Loop */
00154                         return FALSE;
00155                 }
00156         }
00157         return TRUE;
00158 }
00159 /*********************************************************************/
00164 void print_menu(void)
00165 {
00166         _DBG_(menu);
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00171 /*********************************************************************/
00176 int c_entry(void)
00177 {
00178         uint32_t i;
00179         GPDMA_Channel_CFG_Type GPDMACfg;
00180         I2S_MODEConf_Type I2S_ClkConfig;
00181         I2S_CFG_Type I2S_ConfigStruct;
00182         I2S_DMAConf_Type I2S_DMAStruct;
00183         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00184 
00185         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00186          * – 115200bps
00187          * – 8 data bit
00188          * – No parity
00189          * – 1 stop bit
00190          * – No flow control
00191          */
00192         debug_frmwrk_init();
00193 
00194         //print menu screen
00195         print_menu();
00196 
00197         //Initialize buffer
00198         Buffer_Init();
00199 
00200         _DBG_("Press '1' to initialize buffer...");
00201         while(_DG !='1');
00202         _DBG_("Transmit Buffer init: ...");
00203         for(i=0;i<BUFFER_SIZE;i++)
00204         {
00205                 _DBH32(I2STXBuffer[i]);_DBG_("");
00206         }
00207         _DBG_("Receive Buffer init: ...");
00208         for(i=0;i<BUFFER_SIZE;i++)
00209         {
00210                 _DBH32(I2SRXBuffer[i]);_DBG_("");
00211         }
00212 
00213         /* Pin configuration:
00214          * Assign:      - P0.4 as I2SRX_CLK
00215          *                      - P0.5 as I2SRX_WS
00216          *                      - P0.6 as I2SRX_SDA
00217          *                      - P0.7 as I2STX_CLK
00218          *                      - P0.8 as I2STX_WS
00219          *                      - P0.9 as I2STX_SDA
00220          */
00221         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00222         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00223         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00224         PinCfg.Pinnum = 4;
00225         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00226         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00227         PinCfg.Pinnum = 5;
00228         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00229         PinCfg.Pinnum = 6;
00230         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00231         PinCfg.Pinnum = 7;
00232         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00233         PinCfg.Pinnum = 8;
00234         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00235         PinCfg.Pinnum = 9;
00236         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00237 
00238         /* Initialize I2S */
00239         I2S_Init(LPC_I2S);
00240 
00241         //Setup for I2S: RX is similar with TX
00242         /* setup:
00243          *              - wordwidth: 16 bits
00244          *              - stereo mode
00245          *              - master mode for I2S_TX and slave for I2S_RX
00246          *              - ws_halfperiod is 31
00247          *              - not use mute mode
00248          *              - use reset and stop mode
00249          *              - select the fractional rate divider clock output as the source,
00250          *              - disable 4-pin mode
00251          *              - MCLK ouput is disable
00252          *              - Frequency = 44.1 kHz
00253          * Because we use mode I2STXMODE[3:0]= 0000, I2SDAO[5]=0 and
00254          * I2SRX[3:0]=0000, I2SDAI[5] = 1. So we have I2SRX_CLK = I2STX_CLK
00255          * --> I2SRXBITRATE = 1 (not divide TXCLK to produce RXCLK)
00256          */
00257 
00258         /* Audio Config*/
00259         I2S_ConfigStruct.wordwidth = I2S_WORDWIDTH_16;
00260         I2S_ConfigStruct.mono = I2S_STEREO;
00261         I2S_ConfigStruct.stop = I2S_STOP_ENABLE;
00262         I2S_ConfigStruct.reset = I2S_RESET_ENABLE;
00263         I2S_ConfigStruct.ws_sel = I2S_MASTER_MODE;
00264         I2S_ConfigStruct.mute = I2S_MUTE_DISABLE;
00265         I2S_Config(LPC_I2S,I2S_TX_MODE,&I2S_ConfigStruct);
00266 
00267         I2S_ConfigStruct.ws_sel = I2S_SLAVE_MODE;
00268         I2S_Config(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE,&I2S_ConfigStruct);
00269 
00270         /* Clock Mode Config*/
00271         I2S_ClkConfig.clksel = I2S_CLKSEL_FRDCLK;
00272         I2S_ClkConfig.fpin = I2S_4PIN_DISABLE;
00273         I2S_ClkConfig.mcena = I2S_MCLK_DISABLE;
00274         I2S_ModeConfig(LPC_I2S,&I2S_ClkConfig,I2S_TX_MODE);
00275         I2S_ModeConfig(LPC_I2S,&I2S_ClkConfig,I2S_RX_MODE);
00276 
00277         /* Set up frequency and bit rate*/
00278         I2S_FreqConfig(LPC_I2S, 44100, I2S_TX_MODE);
00279         I2S_SetBitRate(LPC_I2S, 0, I2S_RX_MODE);
00280         _DBG_("Press '2' to initialize DMA...");
00281         while(_DG !='2');
00282           /* GPDMA Interrupt configuration section ------------------------------------------------- */
00283 
00284          /* Initialize GPDMA controller */
00285          GPDMA_Init();
00286          LPC_GPDMA->DMACConfig = 0x01;
00287 
00288          /* Setting GPDMA interrupt */
00289      // Disable interrupt for DMA
00290      NVIC_DisableIRQ (DMA_IRQn);
00291      /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00292      NVIC_SetPriority(DMA_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00293 
00294         /*
00295          * Configure GPDMA channel 0 -------------------------------------------------------------
00296          * Used for I2S Transmit
00297          */
00298         // Setup GPDMA channel --------------------------------
00299         // channel 0
00300         GPDMACfg.ChannelNum = 0;
00301         // Source memory
00302         GPDMACfg.SrcMemAddr = DMA_SRC;
00303         // Destination memory
00304         GPDMACfg.DstMemAddr = 0;
00305         // Transfer size
00306         GPDMACfg.TransferSize = BUFFER_SIZE;
00307         // Transfer width - unused
00308         GPDMACfg.TransferWidth = 0;
00309         // Transfer type
00310         GPDMACfg.TransferType = GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_M2P;
00311         // Source connection
00312         GPDMACfg.SrcConn = 0;
00313         // Destination connection - unused
00314         GPDMACfg.DstConn = GPDMA_CONN_I2S_Channel_0;
00315         // Linker List Item - unused
00316         GPDMACfg.DMALLI = 0;
00317         GPDMA_Setup(&GPDMACfg);
00318         _DBG_("DMA Channel 0 setting finised...");
00319         /* Reset terminal counter */
00320         Channel0_TC = 0;
00321         /* Reset Error counter */
00322         Channel0_Err = 0;
00323 
00324         /*
00325         * Configure GPDMA channel 1 -------------------------------------------------------------
00326         * Used for UART0 Receive
00327         */
00328         // Setup GPDMA channel --------------------------------
00329         // channel 1
00330         GPDMACfg.ChannelNum = 1;
00331         // Source memory - unused
00332         GPDMACfg.SrcMemAddr = 0;
00333         // Destination memory
00334         GPDMACfg.DstMemAddr = DMA_DST;
00335         // Transfer size
00336         GPDMACfg.TransferSize = BUFFER_SIZE+1;
00337         // Transfer width - unused
00338         GPDMACfg.TransferWidth = 0;
00339         // Transfer type
00340         GPDMACfg.TransferType = GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_P2M;
00341         // Source connection - unused
00342         GPDMACfg.SrcConn = GPDMA_CONN_I2S_Channel_1;
00343         // Destination connection
00344         GPDMACfg.DstConn = 0;
00345         // Linker List Item - unused
00346         GPDMACfg.DMALLI = 0;
00347         GPDMA_Setup(&GPDMACfg);
00348         _DBG_("DMA Channel 1 setting finised...");
00349         /* Reset terminal counter */
00350         Channel1_TC = 0;
00351         /* Reset Error counter */
00352         Channel1_Err = 0;
00353 
00354         // Enable GPDMA channel 0 & 1
00355         GPDMA_ChannelCmd(0, ENABLE);
00356         GPDMA_ChannelCmd(1, ENABLE);
00357 
00358         // Enable interrupt for DMA
00359         NVIC_EnableIRQ (DMA_IRQn);
00360         _DBG_("Press '3' to start I2S transfer process...");
00361         while(_DG !='3');
00362         _DBG_("I2S Start...");
00363 
00364         I2S_DMAStruct.DMAIndex = I2S_DMA_2;
00365         I2S_DMAStruct.depth = 8;
00366         I2S_DMAConfig(LPC_I2S, &I2S_DMAStruct, I2S_RX_MODE);
00367         I2S_DMAStruct.DMAIndex = I2S_DMA_1;
00368         I2S_DMAStruct.depth = 1;
00369         I2S_DMAConfig(LPC_I2S, &I2S_DMAStruct, I2S_TX_MODE);
00370 
00371         I2S_Start(LPC_I2S);
00372 
00373         I2S_DMACmd(LPC_I2S, I2S_DMA_2, I2S_RX_MODE, ENABLE);
00374         I2S_DMACmd(LPC_I2S, I2S_DMA_1, I2S_TX_MODE, ENABLE);
00375 
00376         while ((Channel0_TC == 0)||(Channel1_TC == 0) );
00377 
00378         _DBG_("I2S Finish...");
00379         _DBG_("Receive Buffer data: ...");
00380         for(i=0;i<BUFFER_SIZE+1;i++)
00381         {
00382          _DBH32(I2SRXBuffer[i]);
00383          if(I2SRXBuffer[i]==0)
00384          {
00385                  _DBG_(" ->Dummy data");
00386          }
00387          else _DBG_("");
00388         }
00389         I2S_DeInit(LPC_I2S);
00390         while(1);
00391         return 1;
00392 }
00393 
00394 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00395    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00396    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00397    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00398    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00399 int main(void)
00400 {
00401     return c_entry();
00402 }

00404 #ifdef  DEBUG
00405 /*******************************************************************************
00406 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00407 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00408 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00409 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00410 * @return               None
00411 *******************************************************************************/
00412 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00413 {
00414         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00415          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00416 
00417         /* Infinite loop */
00418         while(1);
00419 }
00420 #endif
